title: Chat With PDF
question: Extract the outline and key points of this article.

home.intro_text: Immerse yourself in the profound analysis of PDF papers using cutting-edge OpenAI models. Discover the remarkable ability to summarize and analyze any inquiries pertaining to the content of the paper.
home.experience_text: Join us and witness firsthand the incredible power of the LLM language model.
home.student1: Students engage in reading papers within their respective fields to derive inspiration and generate ideas for their own paper writing endeavors by posing thoughtful questions.
home.student2: Researchers diligently undertake extensive paper research and analysis within a particular field, aiming to contribute new insights and knowledge.
home.student3: University professors assume the responsibility of evaluating research project papers, applying their expertise to assess the quality and rigor of the work presented.
home.b1: Enhance document analysis efficiency with ChatPDF. Whether it's financial and sales reports, project and business proposals, training manuals, or legal contracts, ChatPDF can swiftly provide you with the necessary information.
home.b2: Corporate users utilize ChatPDF for conducting intelligence analysis on competitor information. Gain valuable insights and make informed decisions based on comprehensive assessments of your competitors.
home.service_promise1: We guarantee clear and concise responses, devoid of any unnecessary or irrelevant information.
home.service_promise2: Our commitment is to provide accurate answers specifically tailored to your questions. We will not entertain inquiries unrelated to the topic at hand.
home.service_promise3: We ensure to provide proper references for the sources of the text used in our responses.
home.service_promise4: Our fuzzy search functionality enables you to easily locate any content relevant to your paper, allowing for efficient and comprehensive research.

signup.usernameRules: Username must start with a letter, be between 6 and 18 characters long, and can onlycontain letters, numbers, and underscores
signup.passwordRules: Password must be at least 6 characters and at most 18 characters

work.title: PDF Reading Assistant & AI Paper Advisor

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Yes, we are connected to OpenAI in the background, and all uploaded PDF documents will be processed by OpenAI's embedding and answered according to your questions.
faq.a2: Free users can only upload limited documents for analysis, and the number of questions is limited to 20 per day. If you want to obtain more usage rights, please pay to become our member.
faq.q3: After uploading the pdf document, can the Q&A be conducted in various languages?
faq.a3: Yes, OpenAI supports questions and answers in various languages. If you want to ask questions and answers in a specific language, please specify in the question and ask what language you want to answer.
faq.q4: How to carry out effective dissertation analysis?
faq.a4:
In order to conduct effective dissertation analysis, you can ask questions like this: 
  Extract the outline and key knowledge points of this article 
 Please sort out 10 common keywords about this article 
 Please combine the extracted knowledge points of this article, and please give me five questions to test my understanding of this article. 
 (Then, you can make rhetorical questions based on the questions provided by ChatGPT). 
 lease introduce in detail the steps of the experiment in the paper 
 Please summarize what this paper is about
faq.q5: Can ChatPDF answer questions other than papers?
faq.a5: ChatPDF is temporarily unable to answer related content other than papers, and we will upgrade a world knowledge model to answer these questions in the future.
faq.q6: Can ChatPDF understand images and tables in PDF?
faq.a6: ChatPDF can't understand pictures yet, and we will upgrade the multimodal capability in the future. The text content and layout of the table are understandable.
faq.q7: Can ChatPDF analyze multiple documents and answer questions?
faq.a7: We will update this upgrade function in the future and let paying users get the latest.
faq.a8: ChatPDF currently uses GPT 3.5, the same as ChatGPT. We are investigating how to add GPT-4. But GPT-4 won't be available to free members because it costs too much.
faq.q9: How to contact you for further cooperation?

book.tip2: By confirming your subscription, you are consenting to ChatPDF sending a payment invoice to your registered email address as per its terms. Once the payment is successfully made, you will gain full access to the Pro service along with all its privileges.
